effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power is increased.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power is increased.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power is increased.
